ai_business_context: 24 Hour Fitness is a full-service gym/fitness club with cardio and weight equipment, functional training areas, group fitness studios, locker rooms (showers/toilets/sinks), pool, sauna, hot tub, and steam room. Members and staff submit feedback about equipment problems, cleanliness/sanitation, and facility maintenance/safety issues.
ai_categorization_instructions: Prefer specific categories (plumbing/electrical/cleaning/equipment/suggestion). When unsure, use `other` and add a short note in the issue description for internal context.

comments.body: Thanks for flagging—maintenance has been notified and we’ve put an out-of-order sign on the unit.
Appreciate the quick sign. Any ETA? It’s the only one with the long handles.

issue.description: Elliptical E7 (near windows) makes loud grinding noise and resistance drops randomly. Display also flickers when increasing incline.

reports.body: Elliptical E7 is clunking/grinding and the resistance keeps cutting out mid-workout. Screen flickers when I hit incline.
Same elliptical still doing it today—felt like it slipped and then jolted. Please take it offline before someone gets hurt.

updates.message: Unit tagged OUT OF ORDER; service ticket opened with vendor for drive belt and console check.
Technician scheduled; awaiting replacement belt/parts confirmation.

comments.body: We adjusted the flush valve and will monitor. If it reoccurs we’ll replace the flapper/valve assembly.
It’s better but still occasionally runs for a few seconds after flushing.

issue.description: Men’s locker room toilet (second stall from entrance) runs continuously after flushing; occasionally won’t stop unless handle is jiggled.

inbox_entries.location_full_path: Locker Rooms > Men's Locker Room > Toilets

reports.body: Toilet in men’s locker room (2nd stall) keeps running after flush. Wastes a ton of water and is loud.

updates.message: Maintenance inspected; adjusted flush handle/chain and tested multiple flushes.

comments.body: We’re increasing wipe-down checks during peak hours and refilling stations more frequently. Thanks for the note.
Please also add paper towels—wipes alone don’t cut it for benches.

issue.description: Sanitizing wipe station by free weights is frequently empty during evening rush; area gets messy with used wipes on the floor.

reports.body: Wipe dispenser by the dumbbells is empty again (6:30pm). Also lots of used wipes on the floor near the benches.
Second time this week the wipes are out by free weights. Can we keep it stocked?

updates.message: Team reminded to check/replace wipe rolls every hour 4–9pm; added extra refill storage at floor station.
Trialing additional trash can placement near benches to reduce used wipes on floor.

comments.body: We replaced the ballast and cleaned the lens. Let us know if it flickers again.

issue.description: Ceiling light above treadmill row (middle section) flickers and occasionally goes out for a few minutes.

reports.body: Light above the treadmills flickers a lot—gives me a headache when running. It went out completely for a bit too.

updates.message: Maintenance verified flicker; ordered replacement ballast.
Ballast replaced; light tested stable for 30 minutes.

comments.body: We’re checking chemical levels more frequently and have scheduled a filter backwash. Please report if the smell returns.
Smell is improved but the deck still feels slick near the hot tub steps.

issue.description: Strong chlorine smell and cloudy water in hot tub; deck area around hot tub feels slippery.

reports.body: Hot tub water looked cloudy today and the chlorine smell was really strong. Deck is slippery around it too.
Hot tub still cloudy this evening. Please check chemicals/filters.

updates.message: Aquatics tested and adjusted sanitizer/pH; posted caution sign for slippery deck; scheduled filter backwash.
Deck scrubbed with non-slip cleaner; continuing to monitor clarity.

comments.body: We’ve asked the vendor to inspect the steam generator and we’re keeping the room closed until it’s safe.
Thank you for closing it—there was a strong burning smell yesterday.

issue.description: Steam room intermittently shuts off and there is a faint burning smell near the control panel. (Internal note: could be electrical or equipment—categorize as other until inspected.)

reports.body: Steam room keeps cutting out and I smelled something like burning plastic near the panel. Please check ASAP.

updates.message: Steam room closed; vendor service request submitted for steam generator/control inspection.

comments.body: We’ve placed a wet floor sign and submitted a work order to reseal/repair the grout line.
Leak is still there today—water runs toward the lockers.

issue.description: Women’s locker room shower (far left) leaks at the wall/floor seam; water pools and runs into walkway.

inbox_entries.location_full_path: Locker Rooms > Women's Locker Room > Showers

reports.body: Shower on the far left in women’s locker room leaks from the wall seam and makes a big puddle outside the stall.
Same shower still leaking and the puddle is bigger after peak hours.

updates.message: Work order created; temporary signage placed; scheduled maintenance to inspect grout/drain and shower valve.

comments.body: Good idea—sharing with the team. We can add a small sign and include it in new member orientation.

issue.description: Suggestion: Add a quick etiquette sign in the functional training area reminding members to re-rack kettlebells and wipe mats after use.

reports.body: Could you add a small sign in the turf/functional area about re-racking kettlebells and wiping mats? It gets chaotic at night.

updates.message: Team reviewing signage options; will add to next print order.

comments.body: We tightened the mounting bracket and replaced the loose faceplate. Please report if it loosens again.

issue.description: Outlet by stretching mats is loose; plug falls out easily and faceplate is partially detached.

reports.body: The outlet near the stretching mats is loose and the cover is coming off. Seems unsafe.

updates.message: Outlet secured and faceplate replaced; tested with load.

comments.body: We deep-cleaned the sauna benches and increased the wipe-down frequency. We’ll keep an eye on it.

issue.description: Sauna has strong odor and benches feel sticky; floor has visible sweat marks during evenings.

reports.body: Sauna smells pretty bad lately and the benches feel sticky. Could it be cleaned more often?

updates.message: Sauna closed for 30 minutes for deep clean; benches sanitized; floor scrubbed; added evening checklist item.

cleaning.ai_include_keywords: dirty, sticky, smell, odor, trash, overflowing, wipes, sanitizer, mold, mildew, cloudy water, slippery, stain, grime
cleaning.description: Cleanliness, sanitation, trash, odors, spills, slippery floors, locker room/pool deck hygiene, and restocking cleaning supplies.

electrical.ai_include_keywords: flicker, light out, outlet, breaker, power, sparking, burning smell, GFCI, short, wiring
electrical.description: Lighting, outlets, power issues, breakers/GFCI trips, electrical safety concerns, and electrical components.

equipment.ai_include_keywords: treadmill, bike, elliptical, rower, cable, pulley, pin, bench, machine, broken, squeak, grinding, screen, console, resistance
equipment.description: Fitness equipment failures, damage, missing parts, calibration issues, and out-of-order machines.

other.description: Use when the issue doesn’t clearly fit other categories (e.g., mixed symptoms or needs inspection). Add a short internal note in the description.

plumbing.ai_include_keywords: toilet, sink, faucet, shower, drain, clogged, leak, running water, low pressure, hot water, sewer smell
plumbing.description: Water supply/drainage issues: leaks, clogs, toilets/sinks/showers, hot water, pressure, and related restroom/locker room plumbing.

suggestion.ai_include_keywords: suggest, could you, please add, would be nice, recommend, consider, signage, hours, policy
suggestion.description: Non-urgent improvement ideas: signage, amenities, policies, layout, or service enhancements.
